articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets WIDF Chairwoman
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets WIDF Chairwoman
Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and had a talk with Lorena Pena, chairwoman of the Women's International Democratic Federation, and members of the federation leadership who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Monday.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from WIDF Chairwoman
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from WIDF Chairwoman
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from the chairwoman of the Women's International Democratic Federation.
					 The gift was conveyed to Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, by Chairwoman Lorena Pena on Monday.
					
					 The Supreme Leader also received gifts from the National Women's Union of Mexico, the Women's Union of Greece, the Democratic Women's Movement of Portugal and the Italian Federation of Women's Organizations in the Mediterranean.

articles.title: WIDF Meetings Close
articles.content:
WIDF Meetings Close 
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The meeting of the Secretariat and the meeting of the Directive Committee of the Women's International Democratic Federation (WIDF) closed Monday.
					 Present at the meetings of the Federation held here from April 19 to 23 were Chairwoman of the WIDF Lorena Pena, members of the leadership of the Federation, women's delegations and delegates of various countries and officials of the Central Committee of the Socialist Women's Union of Korea.
					
					 The meetings reviewed the work done by the Federation over the last one year to strengthen friendship and solidarity among the world women's organizations and level off the social inequalities of women and defend their rights under the uplifted banner of peace and independence against imperialism and discussed its future action program.
					
					 A letter to the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting of the Directive Committee of the WIDF.
					
					 The Directive Committee decided to confer the title of an outstanding anti-imperialist revolutionary fighter, a hope of the struggle of world women on the anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk for her enormous contribution to the strengthening and development of the Korean women's movement.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants of WIDF Meeting
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants of WIDF Meeting
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a letter from the participants in the meeting of the Directive Committee of the Women's International Democratic Federation on Monday.
					 The letter expressed thanks to Kim Jong Un for having shown hospitality and care for delegates of the WIDF and taken political, organizational and material measures for successful holding of WIDF meetings.
					
					 It said that they were struck with admiration for the reality of the DPRK which has the economic system based on self-development, the top-notch educational system equipped with the latest technology and the wonderful conditions for the children and women.
					
					 It sincerely wished the party, the state and the people of the DPRK success in the struggle to defend peace and achieve the country's independent reunification and implement the five-year strategy for national economic development for building a powerful socialist country.

articles.title: 33rd National Festival of Science and Technology Opens
articles.content:
33rd National Festival of Science and Technology Opens
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The 33rd national festival of science and technology opened.
					 Attending the festival, whose theme is the local production of raw and other materials and equipment and integration of science and technology with economy, are scientists, technicians and officials of more than 500 units selected at the festivals of commissions, ministries, national institutions and provinces (municipality).
					
					 The festival will be divided into 29 panels including power, metal, chemistry, machinery, coal, construction, IT and bio-engineering. There will be exhibition and presentation of scientific and technical achievements, made in the drive for putting the national economy on a Juche, modern, IT and scientific basis, and exchanges of new technologies and service of new goods exchange.
					
					 Its opening ceremony took place at the Three-Revolution Exhibition House Monday.
					
					 Present there were Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and premier of the Cabinet, Pak Thae Song, vice-chairman of the WPK Central Committee, Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission, Jang Chol, president of the State Academy of Sciences, and officials concerned and working people.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony the participants looked round the festival venue.

articles.title: Iranian Embassy Officials Visit Kim Il Sung University
articles.content:
Iranian Embassy Officials Visit Kim Il Sung University 
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Staff members of the Iranian embassy here visited Kim Il Sung University Monday on the occasion of the 45th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and the Islamic Republic of Iran.
					 At the revolutionary museum of the university, they looked round several halls, being briefed on the revolutionary life and undying exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who made sure that the university was built as the first people's university in Korea after its liberation and developed into a center for training national cadres and the supreme seat of scientific education of Juche.
					
					 Earlier they visited the Fatherland Liberation War Historic Site and the Mirim Riding Club.

articles.title: Delegation of China Association for International Friendly Contact Here
articles.content:
Delegation of China Association for International Friendly Contact Here
Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the China Association for International Friendly Contact led by Deputy Secretary-General Zhou Xinzheng arrived here Monday.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Chinese Delegation
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Chinese Delegation
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the China Association for International Friendly Contact on a visit to the DPRK presented a gift to the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					 The gift was conveyed to an official concerned on Monday by Deputy Secretary-General of the China Association for International Friendly Contact Zhou Xinzheng who is heading the delegation.

articles.title: Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan Tours Various Places
articles.content:
Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan Tours Various Places 
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the Day of the Sun led by Ri Ki Sok, adviser of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, visited Pyongyang Teachers Training College.
					 The visitors went round educational science exhibition house, primary school teaching method rehearsal room, room for disseminating technology for developing intellectual faculty of children and other parts of the college, whose education has been put on a scientific, IT and modern basis of high level.
					
					 The group also toured the Korean Revolution Museum, the Ryuwon Footwear Factory and the Pyongyang Primary School for Orphans.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Congratulatory Group of Koreans in China
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Congratulatory Group of Koreans in China
Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a letter from the members of the congratulatory group of the General Association of Koreans in China for celebrating the Day of the Sun on April 17.
					 The members of the group said in the letter that they came to keenly feel again the greatness of President Kim Il Sung, the father of the nation, while attending the celebrations of his 106th birth anniversary, as well as the high honor, pride and happiness of being members of the nation of Kim Il Sung who enjoys boundless reverence and praise from all people as the sun of the 20th century and the outstanding great man.
					
					 It noted that they came to have a firm conviction in the future of the socialist homeland, which will be rosier under the wise leadership of the peerlessly great man, touring the Pyongyang Teacher Training College associated with Kim Jong Un's love for posterity and other parts.
					
					 They were lucky to watch a ballet choreodrama "Red Women Company" of the Chinese art troupe in the presence of Kim Jong Un and his wife Ri Sol Ju, the letter said, adding: The DPRK-China friendship will be ever-lasting thanks to the respected Marshal Kim Jong Un who is developing the traditional friendship between the two countries provided by the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il onto a new high level.
					
					 It said that during the stay in the homeland they enjoyed deep trust and warm benevolence from the respected Marshal and that their faith is growing stronger that there is nothing for them to fear as there is the Marshal and all their glory and happiness rest on trusting and following him to the last.

articles.title: Home-visiting Group of Koreans in Japan Leaves
articles.content:
Home-visiting Group of Koreans in Japan Leaves
Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- A home-visiting group of Koreans in Japan led by Hong Ryung Nam left here on Monday.

articles.title: Delegation of Korean Writers and Artists in Japan Leaves
articles.content:
Delegation of Korean Writers and Artists in Japan Leaves
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- A delegation for celebrating the Day of the Sun of the Union of Korean Writers and Artists in Japan led by Chairman Kim Jong Su left here on Monday.

articles.title: Japanese Friendship Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Japanese Friendship Delegation Leaves
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- An Okayama prefectural Japan-Korea friendship delegation led by Seisuke Mihara, representative of the Association for Promotion of Friendship between Japan and North and South Korea, left here for home on Monday.

articles.title: DPRK Determined to Further Accelerate Advance of Revolution under Banner of Self-reliance
articles.content:
DPRK Determined to Further Accelerate Advance of Revolution under Banner of Self-reliance
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The April 2018 Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) declared the great victory of the line of simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of a nuclear force and set forth the new strategic line of hastening the final victory. The Korean people are seething with this news.
					 Kim Man Su, minister of Electric Power Industry, told KCNA:
					
					 The great victory of simultaneously developing the two fronts is an epoch-making victory to be brilliantly recorded in the history of the country.
					
					 I would like to extend my deep thanks to the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un who has turned the country into an invincible power.
					
					 We workers in the field of electric power industry are determined to dynamically advance toward the new victory, true to the Party's militant call "Let us further accelerate the advance of our revolution by concentrating all our efforts on socialist economic construction!"
					
					 Keeping in mind the position and role of electric power industry in the national economic development, we will strive to increase electric-power production to the maximum.
					
					 Ri Jae Hyon, vice-minister of Agriculture, said:
					
					 The recent plenary meeting serves as a significant occasion in instilling confidence of victory and courage into the hearts of our people and hardening the resolve to contribute to the country's prosperity with burning enthusiasm and patriotic devotion.
					
					 We will surely attain the target of grain production set forth in the five-year strategy for national economic development by taking the Juche farming method and the Party's policy of agriculture as the treasured sword.
					
					 Pak Kum Hui, rector of Pyongyang Teacher Training College, said:
					
					 Bearing in mind the strategic slogan "Let us make a leap forward by dint of science and guarantee the future by dint of education!" advanced by the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, I will orient everything to putting educational work on a higher stage, being conscious of the important task of the university in making the country a country of education and a talent power.

articles.title: Great Event to be Recorded Forever in History of WPK and DPRK
articles.content:
Great Event to be Recorded Forever in History of WPK and DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The news about the Third Plenary Meeting of the Seventh Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea in which the great victory of the WPK's line of simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of a nuclear force was declared and the WPK's fresh strategic line was presented is lashing the whole country into great emotion and joy.
					 The servicepersons and people of the DPRK are determined to turn out as one in the grand advance of economic construction in high spirits with pride and self-confidence of victors, conviction and optimism about hopeful future.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, vice-minister of Coal Industry, told KCNA that the April 2018 Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea is a great event to be recorded forever in the history of the WPK and the DPRK.
					
					 The victory of the WPK's line of simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force would be unthinkable without the "do-or-die" forced march and wise leadership of the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Supreme Leader set forth the militant slogan "Let us further accelerate the advance of our revolution by concentrating all our efforts on socialist economic construction!" at the plenary meeting.
					
					 Our goal is vast, but we will certainly carry out the goal for producing coal set forth at the five-year strategy for national economic development with the conviction that we are sure to win when we advance along the road indicated by the Supreme Leader.
					
					 To Jong Chol, vice-president of the State Academy of Sciences, said:
					
					 Keeping in mind the Supreme Leader's instructions that the spirit of self-reliance and science and technology are the powerful driving force of socialist economic construction, we will put spurs to the grand march of science and technology to activate the overall national economy and put it on an upward spiral track as required by the new strategic line set forth at the historic April plenary meeting.
					
					 Pyon Kyu Sun, president of Kim Hyong Jik University of Education, said:
					
					 The second agenda adopted in the plenary meeting serves as important guidelines in indicating the orientation of developing the Juche education and in clarifying the position of our educators again.
					
					 We will create and complete Korean-style educational method as required by a higher stage of the developing revolution and thus fulfill the mission as a pedigree establishment for the education of the rising generation.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Implementing Decision of Plenary Meeting of C.C., WPK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Implementing Decision of Plenary Meeting of C.C., WPK
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday in an editorial says that the Third Plenary Meeting of the Seventh Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea held under the guidance of the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un proudly declared the great victory of the line of simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force and advanced a new strategic line.
					 The editorial goes on:
					
					 The WPK set forth the strategic line of simultaneously pushing forward the two fronts as required by the prevailing situation and the developing revolution at the historic March 2013 Plenary Meeting of the Party Central Committee.
					
					 The historic tasks, laid down in the line, were successfully carried out and, after all, the arduous struggle of the Korean people to acquire a powerful treasured sword for defending peace came to successful conclusion and a firm guarantee was provided for the dignity and prosperity of all generations to come.
					
					 The great victory of the said line made it possible for the DPRK to accelerate the economic construction as it pleases and our revolution has entered the high stage for hitting the final goal.
					
					 In keeping with the demand of the historic period of the developing revolution, our Party convened the April plenary meeting and advanced a new strategic line for accomplishing the cause of socialist construction.
					
					 The recent plenary meeting provided an epoch-making milestone for the final victory, and it helps the DPRK vigorously advance along the wide road of prosperity.
					
					 The editorial calls upon all the people to turn out in a drive for implementing the decision of the Third Plenary Meeting of the Seventh Central Committee of the WPK, full of confidence and optimism about sure victory and thus achieve the final victory of the Juche revolution as early as possible.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams S. Korean Military Warmongers' Arms Buildup
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams S. Korean Military Warmongers' Arms Buildup
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The south Korean military warmongers decided to introduce various types of ultra-modern military hardware including spy satellite under the pretext of "coping with nuclear and ballistic missile threats" from someone at the 110th meeting of the defence promotion committee some days ago. In its wake, a new-type landing ship was also put into commission.
					 A commentary of Minju Joson Monday describes the south Korean military warmongers' arms buildup as a traitorous act of pursuing the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and a serious military provocation to the DPRK.
					
					 The south Korean military's act of spurring the racket for arms buildup is a crime of chilling the compatriots' desire for reconciliation, unity and reunification, which should be taken issue, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 Outward smile while carrying dagger would never help settle anything. The fellow countrymen have seen more than once that valuable agreement reached between the north and the south might become a dead document overnight if it is not supported by the true willingness to promote national reconciliation and unity.
					
					 However, the south Korean military does not seem to bother to repeat the serious lesson taught by the checkered north-south relations. How can this be interpreted.
					
					 The south Korean military has to face up to the situation and immediately stop the reckless arms buildup racket though belatedly, if it does not want to face the nation's curse and rejection.

articles.title: Feb-Mar Issue of Magazine Thongil Issued
articles.content:
Feb-Mar Issue of Magazine Thongil Issued 
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The International United Confederation of Koreans (International Kothongryon) released the February-March, 2018, issue of Thongil, its monthly social and political magazine.
					 With photos of the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un conducting revolutionary activities, the magazine carried news that he visited the State Academy of Sciences, the newly remodeled Pyongyang Teacher Training College and the Pyongyang Trolley Bus Factory and the news that he made a congratulatory speech at the military parade celebrating the 70th anniversary of the Korean People's Army and met the members of the DPRK high-level delegation who visited the south side to take part in the opening ceremony of the 23rd Winter Olympics and that he visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun to pay homage to leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.
					
					 It also carried the letter sent by Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho to the UN secretary general to denounce the U.S. for ratcheting up the military threats to the DPRK and the answer given by an information room chief of the Institute for American Studies of the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK to questions raised by KCNA, a commentary of the National Reunification Institute "The south Korean authorities should not misunderstand" and other articles clarifying the principled stand of the DPRK to strongly counter the moves to check the improvement of the north-south ties and the peace on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Also carried in the magazine are a commentary of the information department of the Russian Foreign Ministry on the results of the north-south high-level talks and accounts of the press conference called by officials of the Russian Foreign Ministry with TASS and Interfax journalists over the U.S. sanctions on the DPRK.
					
					 The magazine introduced Masikryong Ski Resort of the DPRK with its photos.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Ecuador
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Ecuador
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "The Law on the Nursing and Upbringing of Children of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea" was published in booklet at the Dipagrap Publishing House in Ecuador on April 9 on the occasion of his birth anniversary.

articles.title: National Joint Seminar Held in Belarus
articles.content:
National Joint Seminar Held in Belarus 
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- A Belarusian national joint seminar on the theme of "Comrade Kim Il Sung is the great leader of the Korean people" was held in Minsk on April 7 to mark the Day of the Sun.
					 Personages and members of various political parties and organizations of Belarus attended the seminar, at which a report and speeches were made.
					
					 Vasili Delikov, chairman of the Belarus Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, said in a report that the august name of President Kim Il Sung is shining forever in history as the founder of the Juche idea, a national hero who liberated the Korean people from the Japanese imperialists' colonial yoke, the founder of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean People's Army and the founding father of socialist Korea who built the people's democratic state, the first of its kind in the East. 
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The President devoted his whole life to the revolutionary cause.
					
					 Under his leadership the DPRK turned into a socialist country, independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					 The Korean people entrusted their destinies and future to the President, highly praising him as the tender-hearted father of the nation and the great leader.
					
					 Though he passed away, he is always alive in the hearts of mankind as the peerlessly great man for his exploits.
					
					 L. Shebeleva, vice-chairperson of the National Committee of the "Motherland," a patriotic social organization, said that Kim Il Sung founded the Juche idea and consistently applied it to lead the Korean revolution only to victory and glory.
					
					 The vice-chairperson noted that thanks to Kim Il Sung the new era of history, the era of independence, was ushered in.
					
					 The Juche idea is the revolutionary idea centered on man and serves as the immortal banner showing the road ahead of the popular masses struggling for independence, the vice-chairperson added.
					
					 G. Simanobski, secretary of the Coordinating Council of the Left Patriotic Forces Unity, and Oleg Novikov, chairman of the Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Politics Named after February 16, praised the exploits of Kim Il Sung who defeated the two U.S. and Japanese imperialisms, in one generation, built the DPRK into a socialist bulwark of Juche and made a great contribution to the cause of global independence.
					
					 A congratulatory message to the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: Korean Books Donated to Russian University
articles.content:
Korean Books Donated to Russian University
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- A Korean book-donating ceremony took place at University of Economic Management in Sankt-Petersburg of Russia on April 13.
					 Present there were personages, teachers and students of the university.
					
					 Conveyed at the ceremony were works of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and Korean books introducing the reality of daily prospering Juche Korea and the Korean nation's history of five thousand years and brilliant culture.
					
					 Dmitriyev, vice-president of the university, said that those books would help teachers and students understand better the greatness of the preceding leaders of the DPRK and Kim Jong Un and the true picture of the developing Korean society

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con miembros directivas de la FDIM
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con miembros directivas de la FDIM
Pyongyang, 23 de abril (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, departio el dia 23 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con la presidenta de la Federacion Democratica Internacional de Mujeres, Lorena Pena, y otras miembros de la direccion de esta organizacion que le hicieron una visita de cortesia.

articles.title: Realizada marcha de solidaridad de la FDIM
articles.content:
Realizada marcha de solidaridad de la FDIM
Pyongyang, 23 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 22 en esta capital la marcha de solidaridad de la Federacion Democratica Internacional de Mujeres (FDIM) de 2018 para apoyar la justa causa del pueblo coreano y las mujeres.
					La ceremonia de partida fue efectuada ante el Monumento a las Tres Cartas para la Reunificacion de la Patria.
					
					En la ocasion participaron Jang Chun Sil, presidenta del Comite Central de la Union Socialista de Mujeres de Corea (USMC), las vicepresidentas del Comite Coreano de Solidaridad con los Pueblos del Mundo, las funcionarias del CC de la USMC y las trabajadoras de varios estratos.
					
					Estuvieron presentes tambien Lorena Pena, presidenta de la FDMI, las integrantes de la direccion de la FDIM, las delegaciones y representantes de varios paises, que participan en las reuniones de la FDIM.
					
					En el acto hubo discursos.
					
					La presidenta y vicepresidenta de la FDIM felicitaron la aprobacion de la importante resolucion en el Tercer Pleno del Septimo Periodo del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y rindieron saludo a Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, quien presento nueva linea estrategica de concentrar todas las fuerzas en la construccion de la economica socialista y desarrollar las ciencias y educacion.
					
					Destacaron que las actividades y esfuerzos iniciativos de la RPDC, que prepara el ambiente del alivio de la tension y la paz en la Peninsula Coreana y la region, reciben el apoyo y aplauso de la sociedad internacional.
					
					Las vicepresidentas del Comite Coreano de Solidaridad con los Pueblos del Mundo subrayaron la necesidad de fortalecer la solidaridad mutua entre los pueblos mundiales aspirantes a la justicia y amantes de la paz y expusieron la decision de cumplir la mision internacional asumida en la construccion de nuevo mundo libre de la agresion, la guerra, la dominacion y el saqueo.
					
					Quedo publicada la declaracion de solidaridad de la federacion con la justa causa del pueblo coreano y las mujeres.
					
					Las participantes en la marcha partieron del Monumento a las Tres Cartas para la Reunificacion de la Patria.
					
					Las masas dieron calurosa bienvenida a las caravanistas que dinamizan las justas actividades solidarias internacionales.

articles.title: Inaugurado el 33o Festival Nacional de Ciencias y Tecnicas
articles.content:
Inaugurado el 33o Festival Nacional de Ciencias y Tecnicas
Pyongyang, 23 de abril (ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurado el 33o Festival Nacional de Ciencias y Tecnicas con el tema de asegurar con recursos domesticos las materias primas, materiales y equipos y unificar las ciencias y tecnicas con la economia.
					En la ocasion participaron los cientificos, tecnicos y funcionarios de mas de 500 unidades ganadoras de los festivales de ciencias y tecnicas de los comites, ministerios, organos centrales y de las provincias (ciudades directamente subordinadas al centro).
					
					El evento se realiza dividido en 29 secciones como electricidad, metales, quimica, maquinas, carbon, construccion, IT y biotecnologia.
					
					Se exhibiran y se presentaran los exitos cientificos y tecnicos alcanzados en la lucha por realizar la jucheanizacion, la modernizacion, la informatizacion y la cientifizacion de la economia nacional.
					
					Tendra lugar tambien el intercambio de nuevas tecnologias y productos.
					
					La ceremonia de apertura tuvo lugar el dia 23 en la Exposicion Permanente de las Tres Revoluciones.
					
					Estuvieron presentes Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y primer ministro de la RPDC, Pak Thae Song, vicepresidente del CC del PTC, Kim Sung Du, presidente del Comite de Educacion, Jang Chol, director de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias, los funcionarios interesados y los trabajadores.
					
					Terminada la ceremonia inaugural, los participantes recorrieron la sede del festival.
